data.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Cosmetics: Phase One Card Backs
data.detailed_description:
A collection of exclusive card backs for all your favourite warbands in Phase One! Unlock in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.

CARD BACKS

  • Steelheart’s Champions
  • Magore’s Fiends
  • Sepulchral Guard
  • Ironskull’s Boyz
  • Spiteclaw’s Swarm
  • The Farstriders
  • The Chosen Axes
  • Thorns of the Briar Queen
  • Stormsire's Cursebreakers
  • Eyes of the Nine

Please note: In order to use these card backs you must first own the associated warband DLC. If you do not own the warband DLC at purchase, the items will be stored in your inventory and will unlock when an associated DLC warband purchase is made.

data.short_description: A collection of exclusive card backs for all your favourite warbands in Phase One of Warhammer Underworlds: Online!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 @ 2.80 GHz / AMD FX-4350 @ 4.2 GHz
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
